channel.title: Npc's wont disappear when killed
channel.description: when i was testing the ::npc i spawned a man, and when i killed it they drop to when they die but they dont disappear =P, but if you try to attack it, it says "that monster has been killed" :S BTW this is a Cleaned deltascape source.

item.title: Npc's wont disappear when killed
item.dc:creator: @lazyjack lazyjack
item.description:
@lazyjack wrote:

when i was testing the ::npc i spawned a man, and when i killed it they drop to when they die but they dont disappear =P, but if you try to attack it, it says “that monster has been killed” :S
BTW this is a Cleaned deltascape source.
